languages.text: "Стойкость исполнения данной единицей ее обязанностей частично примиряет с нехваткой у нее чувства долга, достаточного, чтобы самостоятельно прервать свои жизненные функции".

"The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."
languages.original_text: "Стойкость исполнения данной единицей ее обязанностей частично примиряет с нехваткой у нее чувства долга, достаточного, чтобы самостоятельно прервать свои жизненные функции".

traits.locale_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “该单位在履行职责时表现出的顽强态度，部分可归结于该单位缺乏责任感。在当时的情况下，更可取的做法是自主中断生命功能。”
languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: “该单位在履行职责时表现出的顽强态度，部分可归结于该单位缺乏责任感。在当时的情况下，更可取的做法是自主中断生命功能。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La ténacité de l'unité dans l'exécution de ses obligations peut être partiellement expliquée par la déficience de son sens du devoir ; la meilleure solution aurait été de mettre un terme définitif à ses fonctions vitales. »
languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: « La ténacité de l'unité dans l'exécution de ses obligations peut être partiellement expliquée par la déficience de son sens du devoir ; la meilleure solution aurait été de mettre un terme définitif à ses fonctions vitales. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La tenacidad de la unidad en el cumplimiento de sus obligaciones puede explicarse parcialmente por un sentido del deber defectuoso: una respuesta superior habría sido detener independientemente sus funciones vitales».
languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: «La tenacidad de la unidad en el cumplimiento de sus obligaciones puede explicarse parcialmente por un sentido del deber defectuoso: una respuesta superior habría sido detener independientemente sus funciones vitales».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「あのユニットが見せた己の義務を遂行しようという執念は、不完全な義務感で説明できる部分がある…優れた対応とは、自発的に生命機能を停止することではない」
languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: 「あのユニットが見せた己の義務を遂行しようという執念は、不完全な義務感で説明できる部分がある…優れた対応とは、自発的に生命機能を停止することではない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Hartnäckigkeit, mit der die Einheit ihre Pflichten ausgeführt hat, lässt sich teilweise durch ihr mangelndes Pflichtbewusstsein erklären. Die bessere Reaktion wäre es, unabhängig Lebensfunktionen zu beenden."
languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: "Die Hartnäckigkeit, mit der die Einheit ihre Pflichten ausgeführt hat, lässt sich teilweise durch ihr mangelndes Pflichtbewusstsein erklären. Die bessere Reaktion wäre es, unabhängig Lebensfunktionen zu beenden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

languages.text: "Birimin yükümlülüklerini yerine getirmekteki azmi, görev bilincindeki eksiklikle kısmen açıklanabilir. Aslında durumdan bağımsız olarak yaşam fonksiyonlarını kesinkes durdurması gerekirdi."
languages.original_text: "The tenacity displayed by the unit in the execution of his obligations can be partly explained by his deficient sense of duty — the superior response would be to independently discontinue life functions."

traits.locale_text: "Birimin yükümlülüklerini yerine getirmekteki azmi, görev bilincindeki eksiklikle kısmen açıklanabilir. Aslında durumdan bağımsız olarak yaşam fonksiyonlarını kesinkes durdurması gerekirdi."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
